casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Groves, Appellee, v. Community Action Program; Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellant.

[Cite as State ex rel. Groves v. Community Action Program (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 357.]

(No. 97-2271 Submitted August 19, 1998 Decided October 14, 1998.) Richard L. Williger, for appellee. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Jonathan A. Good, Assistant Attorney General, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State ex rel. Russell v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 82 Ohio St.3d 516, 696 N.E.2d 1069.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
